.. include:: ../common/unsafe.rst

Random Numbers
================

.. py:module:: toy_crypto.rand
    :synopsis: Randon number utitilities

This are imported with::

    import toy_crypto.rand

.. currentmodule:: toy_crypto.rand

For the most part, the functions here duplicate some utilities from :py:mod:`random`, but use the cryptographically secure random number generator from :py:mod:`secrets`.
